welcome_message_body: "Welcome to beautiful Bois-des-Filion! This charming city is known for its picturesque landscapes, rich history, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and delight in all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mirabel Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Mirabel Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pierre Elliott Trudeau International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Pierre Elliott Trudeau International Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at St Jean Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at St Jean Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
